comments:
When I run HtmlView in the org.eclipse.basebuilder project (I use "I d:/html" 
as program args) in org.eclipse.test.performance.ui, I get this exception:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero
	at 
org.eclipse.test.internal.performance.eval.StatisticsSession.computeStats
(StatisticsSession.java:92)
	at 
org.eclipse.test.internal.performance.eval.StatisticsSession.getStats
(StatisticsSession.java:63)
	at 
org.eclipse.test.internal.performance.eval.StatisticsSession.getAverage
(StatisticsSession.java:45)
	at org.eclipse.test.internal.performance.db.Scenario.getTimeSeries
(Scenario.java:81)
	at org.eclipse.performance.graph.Grapher.run(Grapher.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.performance.graph.Grapher.<init>(Grapher.java:55)
	at org.eclipse.performance.graph.HtmlView.main(HtmlView.java:40)

The problem was in fact a conseqeunce of #75691. It resulted in empty DataPoints in the DB. I've fixed 
the perf plugin so that empty DataPoints are ignored.
